app.name: Legacy XP
app.long_description: Legacy XP is a custom Smash Bros. mod that aims to pack as much high quality content in a single build as possible, using Project M as base. Project M is the premier Brawl modification inspired by Super Smash Bros. Melee's gameplay designed to add rich, technical gameplay to a balanced cast of characters while additionally enhancing the speed of play. Project M employs new codes which seamlessly add in new, universal features to the entire cast to add technical variety to all characters.
